body_html:
@sareg0 tries to convince testmeister @marcgreenstock to add some tests for

  • Application::Data
  • Rating::Calc
  • Application::Todo
  • rudimentary controller spec (with render_views) to touch app/controllers/applications/*_controller.rb

With that in mind, LGTM!

body:
@sareg0 tries to convince testmeister @marcgreenstock to add some tests for 
- `Application::Data`
- `Rating::Calc`
- `Application::Todo` 
- rudimentary controller spec (with `render_views`) to touch `app/controllers/applications/*_controller.rb`

With that in mind, LGTM!
